about_the_game:
Cupid: Roguelite offers a fresh twist on the classic tale of Cupid's arrow, blending action-packed 2D slide scrolling gameplay with strategic decision-making in an enchanting and ever-changing world. Will you be able to find your perfect match, or will you meet a heart-pounding defeat in the clouds? It's time to spread love and arrows in the most unconventional way possible!

Features:

  • Randomized Levels:

    Every playthrough offers a unique set of challenges and opportunities, ensuring no two games are alike.

  • Vibrant Visuals:

    "Cupid: Roguelite" boasts a charming and colorful 2D world, creating a delightful atmosphere for players.

  • Intriguing Characters:

    Discover a cast of endearing characters as you pursue the affections of various girls, each with their own personality and preferences.

  • Replayability:

    With a variety of target girls, equipment, and upgrades to choose from, you'll find yourself returning to the skies time and time again.

  • Roguelite Mechanics:

    The game follows a roguelite format, meaning that if you're shot down by an enemy, you'll lose all your equipment, adding a challenging and strategic element to your journey.

short_description: Cupid: Roguelite is an exciting 2D side-scrolling roguelite game that combines fast-paced action with strategic decision-making. In this world, you step into the shoes of Cupid. You must choose a target girl, and it's up to the Cupid helping you find your true love.
